title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
r new journals are recorded for your companion quest. He will give you the quest: Kill Raphael's Old Enemy and your next objective for the Pale Elf. When he tells you to kill the devil he speaks about, you will have a chance to respond:

[INSIGHT] you're still only telling me half of what you really know. Ic an tell. I'll consider my actions when I get there. On the other hand, the enemy of my enemy etcetera.

You can attempt to pass the Insight check and he will lightly elaborate. Your interact
